mapper.select:
select
distinct
from CIS_ORGANINFO
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select:
SELECT t.year,
SUM(t.ycslinenum)/SUM(t.ycsminnum)*100 AS rate
SUM(t.ycsnum)/SUM(t.ycsminnum)*100 AS rate
FROM them_ycs_qkrs t WHERE 1=1
AND t.orgcode like #{orgCode}
AND t.YEAR BETWEEN #{startY} AND #{endY} GROUP BY t.YEAR ORDER BY t.YEAR DESC

SELECT NAME AS "${@com.limp.framework.core.constant.Constant@CODE_TRANS_PRE}NAME" ,NUM FROM ( SELECT
CO_BUSTYPE AS NAME,
CO_BUSTYPE AS NAME,
CO_FINASOURCE AS NAME,
CO_FUNTYPE AS NAME,
CO_PARTTYPE AS NAME,
COUNT(1) NUM FROM CIS_ORGANINFO t1 left join (select * from cis_orgcertificate where substr(CO_ENDTIME,0,4)>#{date} ) t2 on t1.co_uid=t2.co_orgcode START WITH t1.CO_ORGCODE=#{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR t1.CO_ORGCODE = t1.CO_ORGCODEUP
GROUP BY CO_BUSTYPE
GROUP BY CO_BUSTYPE
GROUP BY CO_FINASOURCE
GROUP BY CO_FUNTYPE
GROUP BY CO_PARTTYPE
) WHERE NAME IS NOT NULL
AND NAME !='104_0' AND NAME!='104_'
mapper.update:
update CIS_ORGANINFO
CO_ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_UID = #{record.uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_CERTID = #{record.certid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_ORGNAME = #{record.orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CO_HEADHAS = #{record.headhas,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_FINASOURCE = #{record.finasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_RESPPERSON = #{record.respperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_LEGALPERSON = #{record.legalperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_SUBJECTION = #{record.subjection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_NATURETYPE = #{record.naturetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_APPRNUM = #{record.apprnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_PERTOTALNUM = #{record.pertotalnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_PERSURLV1 = #{record.persurlv1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_PERSURLV2 = #{record.persurlv2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_PERSURLV3 = #{record.persurlv3,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_PERSUROCEAN = #{record.persurocean,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_PERSURDRAW = #{record.persurdraw,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_PERSURPRODUCT = #{record.persurproduct,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_JUNIORDOWN = #{record.juniordown,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_JUNIORUP = #{record.juniorup,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_BACHELORUP = #{record.bachelorup,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_GRADUATEUP = #{record.graduateup,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_OFFICEAREA = #{record.officearea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_DEVICE = #{record.device,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_CARNUM = #{record.carnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_COMPUNUM = #{record.compunum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_SHIPNUM7 = #{record.shipnum7,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_SHIPNUM7TO12 = #{record.shipnum7to12,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_SHIPNUM12TO24 = #{record.shipnum12to24,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_SHIPNUM24 = #{record.shipnum24,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CO_OCESHIPNUM5 = #{record.oceshipnum5,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

CO_PERSURLV1 = #{record.persurlv1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_PERSURLV2 = #{record.persurlv2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_PERSURLV3 = #{record.persurlv3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_PERSUROCEAN = #{record.persurocean,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_PERSURDRAW = #{record.persurdraw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_PERSURPRODUCT = #{record.persurproduct,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_JUNIORDOWN = CO_OFFICEAREA = #{record.officearea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CO_DEVICE = #{record.device,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_CARNUM = #{record.carnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_COMPUNUM = #{record.compunum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_SHIPNUM7 = #{record.shipnum7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_SHIPNUM7TO12 = #{record.shipnum7to12,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_SHIPNUM12TO24 = #{record.shipnum12to24,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_SHIPNUM24 = #{record.oceshipnum12to24,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_OCESHIPNUM24TO45 = #{record.oceshipnum24to45,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_OCESHIPNUM45 = #{record.oceshipnum45,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_ORGSCOPE = #{record.entreparenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_ENTPRODUCTNUM = #{record.entproductnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_ENTDESINUM = #{record.entdesinum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CO_ALLBOATNUM = #{record.allboatnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.select:
select count(*) as "value",co_typelv as "${@com.limp.framework.core.constant.Constant@CODE_TRANS_PRE}name" from cis_organinfo t
co_typelv IS NOT NULL
and t.co_uid like #{like}
group by co_typelv ORDER BY co_typelv ASC

select t3.co_orgname as "proname", t2.co_orgname as "cityname", t1.co_orgname as "orgname", (select count(1) from cis_shipinfo where CS_ORGID = t1.co_orgcode) "shipNums", nvl((select CSC_SCORE from cis_capacity t3 inner JOIN (select CSC_REFID, max(csc_batch) csc_batch from CIS_CAPACITY group by CSC_REFID) T4 on T3. CSC_REFID = T4.CSC_REFID and T3.csc_batch = T4.csc_batch where t3.csc_refid = t1.co_orgcode and csc_belongmodel = '2001' and CSC_TYPE = '1' and rownum=1),0) as "score", decode((select count(1) num from cis_ship_check where CSC_ORGCODE = t1.co_orgcode and CSC_CHECKTIME like #{year}),0,0, (select count(1) num from cis_ship_check where CSC_ORGCODE = t1.co_orgcode and CSC_CHECKPASS = '1' and CSC_CHECKTIME like #{year}) * 100 / (select count(1) num from cis_ship_check where CSC_ORGCODE = t1.co_orgcode and CSC_CHECKTIME like #{year})) as "checkRate" from cis_organinfo t1 left join cis_organinfo t2 on t1.co_orgcodeup = t2.co_orgcode left join cis_organinfo t3 on t2.co_orgcodeup = t3.co_orgcode where t1.co_typelv = '6'
and t1.co_orgcode like #{likeStr}

select co_orgname "orgname",co_respperson "respperson",CO_CONTACTPHONE "tel",CO_ENDTIME "nextChcTime", case when to_date(co_endtime,'yyyy-mm-dd')>sysdate then '待审核' else '已完成' end "chcState" from cis_organinfo t1 inner join CIS_ORGCERTIFICATE t2 on t1.co_orgcode = t2.co_orgcode where to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')=substr(co_endtime,0,4)
AND t2.co_orgcode like #{likeStr}
